tasks.task: Adjusting an agricultural implement on a toolbar using a lock pin.
subtasks: Align the implement with the desired position on the toolbar.
Rotate the lock pin into place to secure the implement.
Confirm the implement is securely fastened.

tasks.task: Setting the velvet begging depth on an agricultural implement.
subtasks: Identify the depth control knob or gauge wheel.
Rotate the knob or adjust the gauge wheel to the desired depth.
Verify the depth using a depth gauge or visual check.

tasks.task: Adjusting the position of an agricultural implement on a toolbar using a lock pin.
subtasks: Align the implement's attachment on the toolbar to the desired position.
Insert the lock pin into the selected position on the toolbar.
Rotate the lock pin until it secures the implement.
